name: Virtual Visits powered by Twilio
description: A template for getting started with Virtual Visit.

TWILIO_ACCOUNT_SID.description: Your Twilio Account SID. Get a free account at twilio.com/try-twilio

TWILIO_AUTH_TOKEN.description: Your Twilio Auth Token. You can get it at twilio.com/console

TWILIO_API_KEY.description: Your Twilio API Key. You can get it at twilio.com/console/project/api-keys

TWILIO_API_SECRET.description: Your Twilio Auth Token. You can get it at twilio.com/console/project/api-keys

TWILIO_PHONE_NUMBER.description: The Twilio phone number you want to use to send SMS. Get one in the Twilio Console

INVITE_BASE_URL.description: The base URL sent as part of the Virtual Visit invitation
